projects.title: Bank Marketing Project
projects.description: The goal of this project is to predict whether a bank client will subscribe to a term deposit based on various customer and campaign-related attributes, thereby enabling the bank to better target its marketing efforts.

projects.title: Churn Prediction
projects.description: The goal of this project is to analyze various customer attributes and behaviors, the project aims to identify the factors leading to churn and build a predictive model to forecast which customers are likely to leave the service.

projects.title: Social Media Recommender System
projects.description: The goal of this project is to create a model that uses KNN to create a recommender system for Social Media. Use of recommended system model, NLP and Unsupervised learning.

projects.title: House Price Prediction
projects.description: The goal of this project is to create a model that can estimate the price of house based on various features.

publications_and_conference_certificates.title: SMARTNEST: An Automation System using IOT and ML
publications_and_conference_certificates.conference: International Conference in Emerging Trends in IOT and Computing Technologies (ICEICT 2023)
publications_and_conference_certificates.description: Build a SmartHome using arduino capabilities and IOT sensors. Includes sensors like flame, temperature, automated fan.
